title: Animatronic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Bite someone’s frontal lobe
-Initiate a springlock failure, killing yourself instantly

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-This role may not spawn naturally
-Everyone knows you’re an animatronic
-If William Afton (3373) dies, you die as well, and may not be brought back ever again
-You share a night chat with William Afton (3373)
-You may target William Afton. Only some very specific scenario would you use this, but you can

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that William Afton wins the game

desc:
Post 3373.5
_This fuckin’ bear suit’s full of springlocks that could fail at any time. STAY SAFE!_
